title: Calories in One Glass of Apple Juice
meta_description: Discover calories in an apple juice serving (1 cup/240 ml), including carbs, sugars, full nutrition breakdown, and variations for better choices.
h1: Calories in One Glass of Apple Juice
assumptions: One 8-oz (240 ml) glass of unsweetened, 100% apple juice, no added sugar or preservatives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, processing (e.g., from concentrate), added sugars, and serving size. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One cup of unsweetened apple juice contains about 114 kcal, mostly from natural sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in an apple juice glass?
faqs.a: About 114 kcal for one 240 ml cup of unsweetened apple juice.

faqs.q: Is apple juice high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, one cup has ~25 g natural sugars, contributing most of the 114 kcal.

faqs.q: What's the carb content in apple juice?
faqs.a: Approximately 28 g carbs per cup, with minimal fiber (0.5 g).

faqs.q: Does apple juice have fat or protein?
faqs.a: Negligible—0.2 g fat and 0.2 g protein per cup.

faqs.q: How does sweetened apple juice compare?
faqs.a: Sweetened versions add 20–50 extra kcal per cup from added sugars.
